It's All About the First Century

  • warning: fopen() [function.fopen]: Filename cannot be empty in /nfs/c04/h01/mnt/66721/domains/themonthlychallenge.com/tags/release-1.1/includes/file.inc on line 757.
  • The file could not be created.
  • warning: fopen() [function.fopen]: Filename cannot be empty in /nfs/c04/h01/mnt/66721/domains/themonthlychallenge.com/tags/release-1.1/includes/file.inc on line 757.
  • The file could not be created.
Mon, 05/18/2009 - 08:24 | by Jesse

I'm starting my second day of rest this week, which means I'm probably not going to reach 350 miles by Friday. But to be honest, it's not a huge deal to me because yesterday, I finished my first century (a 100 mile ride). I rode from Griffith Park to Santa Monica, then up the PCH past Malibu and back the same route. My legs are pretty sore and I'm fairly tired, but I feel great.

Tags:
  • cycling
  • fitness
  • health
